actionConfiguration.body:
with update_customer_collection_declation AS (
    UPDATE
        customer_collection_declation 
	SET
            shop_id={{ shop_id_data_old.selectedOptionValue }},
						shop_name= {{"'" + shop_id_data_old.selectedOptionLabel + "'"}},
						received_amount={{parseInt(collection_declaration_tbl.triggeredRow.received_amount) + parseInt(received_amount_old.text) }},
						adjusted_amount={{ adjusted_amount_old.text }},
						unadjusted_amount={{ unadjusted_amount_old.text }},
						proof_of_amount_received={{"'" + proof_doc_old.image + "'"}},
						receive_date=cast({{"'" + moment(receive_date_old).format('YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm') + "'"}} as timestamptz)
	where id = {{collection_declaration_tbl.triggeredRow.id}}
)
INSERT INTO
        customer_collection_declation_log (
						received_amount,
						adjusted_amount,
						unadjusted_amount,
						proof_of_amount_received,
						receive_date,
						customer_collection_declation_id
        )
    VALUES (
				{{ received_amount_old.text }},
				{{ adjusted_amount_old.text }},
				{{ unadjusted_amount_old.text }},
				{{"'" + proof_doc_old.image + "'"}},
				cast({{"'" + moment(receive_date_old).format('YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm') + "'"}} as timestamptz),
				{{collection_declaration_tbl.triggeredRow.id}})
				returning customer_collection_declation_id
